name: sunday morning wrap
sizes_available: 203 cm x 38 cm (80 x 15â€) after wet blocking
notes:
> espace tricot is a yarn store in montreal, canada. [discover our yarns here!][1]

our sunday morning dk yarn is a deliciously rustic yet soft blend of bluefaced leicester and masham fibres spun and dyed in england. the unique blend of naturally brown and off-white fibres creates a heathered effect which brings depth and dimension.

as a nod to the coziness and slower pace of sunday mornings, our sunday morning wrap is a relaxing, lightly textured design worked in alternate sections of stockinette and twisted rib. in the shape of an inverted isosceles trapezoid, the elongated shape is perfect both as a light wrap and a cozy scarf, and makes for a perfectly gender neutral accessory.

sample shown in the colourway offline
